chapter.para: Important things to know before deploying &productname;.

sect1.title: Important Changes
sect1.para: Different schedulers, such as Diego and Eirini, and different stacks, such as cflinuxfs3 or sle15, have different memory requirements for applications. Not every combination is tested so there is no universal memory setting for ∩, and because it depends on the application deployed, it is up to the user to adjust the setting based on their application.
